text: @Alyssa_Milano @GOP Yup and look at the mess he’s continued to make since then. 100,000+ deaths because he didn’t think COVID-19 was that bad..... & Now causing clashes in the street with racial comments to further divide the country. Had they removed him, things would not be this bad. If at all. 🤷🏾‍♂️
